description.default: You are in a grand lobby with a high, vaulted ceiling and a polished marble floor. A long counter of dark, polished wood dominates one wall, protected by armed guards. A banker waits patiently.

objects.all_quests_done_message: The banker gives you a crisp, professional nod.
objects.description: A sharply-dressed banker stands behind the counter, ready to assist you.
objects.name: a banker

objects.description: A long, polished counter of dark wood.
objects.name: counter
